title: What are some fields like tech where you can quickly do well in the money department if done right? - Quora

response.answer_text: As a Tech to be able to “quickly do well in the money department" you need to first develop skills, gain knowledge, and get relevant experience. In many professions, such as plumbers and electricians, they also need special Master Certification, unless they want to remain as the supporting cast. All this can only be learned over time, first apprenticing with someone really competent, earning a good reputation for yourself, and then going on your own. Of course future success depends upon maintaining your reputation with prompt and quality service, while remaining competitive in your charges.
